name: Mars Marine (RomeRomey)
description:
Mars Marine is a the final project from Gamedev.tv's Unreal Engine Blueprints Course. I decided to polish it up just a bit and add some things like a pause menu, options, and hit detection.


Controls:

WASD/Left Stick: Move Around

Mouse/Right Stick: Aim

Pause: P

Main Menu Music by Patrick Zappia

Gameplay Music by Me
